about.details:
Rachana Infrastructure Limited offers infrastructure and civil construction services. Rachana Infrastructure is a mid-size private sector company engaged in the business of construction of roads and highways, irrigation, hydropower project and mining and pipeline construction. Rachana Infrastructure Limited is expanding business in the other states of India like Maharashtra, Madhya Pradesh, Jharkhand and Rajasthan.

The roads project that the company has executed are MPRDC- ADB Loan IV, OPAL Petrochemical Refinery Road work at Dajeh SEZ, C.C Road Construction for MP PWD and Vadodara-Mumbai 6 Lane Highway.

Rachana Infrastructure Limited has an in-house integrated system and machinery for all stages of mining, right from Mining/Extraction of raw material from the mine up to Crushing and Finished Production of Black Trap Stone Aggregate.

Competitive Strength

  • Leading Road-focused BOQ and EPC Contractor.
  • Management and an integrated in-house project team with strong execution capabilities and extensive industry experience.
  • Visible growth through a robust order book.

faqs.question: What is the Rachana Infrastructure IPO?
faqs.answer:
Rachana Infrastructure IPO is a SME IPO of 5650000 equity shares of the face value of ₹10 aggregating up to ₹76.28 Crores. The issue is priced at ₹135 per share. The minimum order quantity is 1000.

The IPO opens on May 20, 2022, and closes on June 2, 2022.

Bigshare Services Pvt Ltd is the registrar for the IPO. The shares are proposed to be listed on NSE SME.

faqs.question: How to apply in Rachana Infrastructure IPO through Zerodha?
faqs.answer:
Zerodha customers can apply online in Rachana Infrastructure IPO using UPI as a payment gateway. Zerodha customers can apply in Rachana Infrastructure IPO by login into Zerodha Console (back office) and submitting an IPO application form.

Steps to apply in Rachana Infrastructure IPO through Zerodha

  1. Visit the Zerodha website and login to Console.
  2. Go to Portfolio and click the IPOs link.
  3. Go to the 'Rachana Infrastructure IPO' row and click the 'Bid' button.
  4. Enter your UPI ID, Quantity, and Price.
  5. Submit IPO application form.
  6. Visit the UPI App (net banking or BHIM) to approve the mandate.

Visit Zerodha IPO Application Process Review for more detail.

faqs.question: When Rachana Infrastructure IPO will open?
faqs.answer: The Rachana Infrastructure IPO opens on May 20, 2022 and closes on June 2, 2022.

faqs.question: What is the lot size of Rachana Infrastructure IPO?
faqs.answer: Rachana Infrastructure IPO lot size is 1000, and the minimum amount required is ₹1,35,000.

faqs.question: How to apply for Rachana Infrastructure IPO?
faqs.answer: You can apply in Rachana Infrastructure IPO online using either UPI or ASBA as a payment method. ASBA IPO application is available in the net banking of your bank account. UPI IPO application is offered by brokers who don't offer banking services. Read more detail about applying IPO online through Zerodha, Upstox, 5Paisa, Nuvama, HDFC Bank, and SBI Bank.
